description: Portrait of Giuseppe Alberto de Ambiveri
inscription:
Inscription

UL canvas outside the painted oval: [\'JOSEPH ALBERTUS DE AMBEIVERE CO: I.V.D. COLLEGS FILIUS NOB. FRANCISCI/FERRATIS\'] (Translated: Joseph Albertus de Ambiveri, son of Nobleman Francesco Ferrante Ambiveri.  I.V.D. Colleg(es) refers to the body of worthies to whom the portrait belonged).
title: Portrait of Giuseppe Alberto de Ambiveri, Vicar of the Mines of Bergamo
